components.name: Screengrab
components.description: A component responsible for capturing screenshots of Android applications.

components.name: ScreenshotStrategy
components.description: An interface defining various strategies for taking screenshots, including different methods like DecorView and UiAutomator.

components.name: FileWritingScreenshotCallback
components.description: Handles the saving of captured screenshots to the file system.

components.name: CleanStatusBar
components.description: Manages the status bar appearance during screenshot capture to ensure a clean output.

data_flows.description: Screengrab invokes the ScreenshotStrategy to determine the method for capturing screenshots.
After capturing a screenshot, the strategy passes the image data to the callback for saving.
The callback may invoke CleanStatusBar to adjust the status bar settings before saving the screenshot.

trust_boundaries.name: User Device Trust Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: The boundary between the user's device and the Fastlane service components.
